stochastic_function: lambda launch_decision, market_demand, competitor_pricing, production_difficulty: {1: 1.0} if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand == 'high' else ({0.5: 0.5, -1: 0.5} if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand == 'neutral' and competitor_pricing == 'high' else ({1: 0.3, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.4} if launch_decision == 'launch' and (market_demand == 'neutral' or market_demand == 'low') and production_difficulty == 'low' else {-1: 1.0})) if launch_decision == 'not launch' else {0: 1.0}
